mapper.select: SELECT /*sb.repository.mapper.AcnoGenMapper.S001*/ LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(ACNO),0) + 1,11,'0') AS ACNO /*계좌번호*/ FROM SB.RPB1000 /*잔고*/
SELECT /*sb.repository.mapper.AcnoGenMapper.S002*/ ACNO /*계좌번호*/ , DACA /*예수금*/ , CUST_NM /*예수금*/ , OPRT_TR_DTM /*조작거래일시*/ FROM SB.RPB1000 /*잔고*/ WHERE ACNO = '${ACNO}'
mapper.insert: INSERT /*sb.repository.mapper.AcnoGenMapper.I001*/ INTO SB.RPD0100 (ACNO, LAST_TR_NO, LAST_TR_DT,OPRT_TR_DTM ) VALUES ('${ACNO}', ${LAST_TR_NO}, '${LAST_TR_DT}', DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
INSERT /*sb.repository.mapper.AcnoGenMapper.I002*/ INTO SB.RPB1000 (ACNO, DACA, CUST_NM,OPRT_TR_DTM ) VALUES ('${ACNO}', 0, '${CUST_NM}', DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
